isis.stitle: ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - WT TRANSMISSION DIAGNOSTIC CODES - EXITING THE DIAGNOSTIC DISPLAY MODE

svcproc.title: EXITING THE DIAGNOSTIC DISPLAY MODE
svcproc.para: The diagnostic display mode can be exited by any of the following procedures:

step1.para: Momentarily pushing the display mode button.
Move the shift lever to any position other than the position it was in to perform the diagnostics.

note.para: If the shift is still inhibited, the ECU will continue to command the current range and sound the tone continuously until the lever is returned to the range where the diagnostic code was logged.

step1.para: Do nothing and wait until the calibrated time has passed and the system automatically returns to the normal operating mode.
Turn OFF power to the ECU (turn vehicle ignition key OFF).
